text: The men's 1500 metres in speed skating at the 1994 Winter Olympics took place on 12 February, at the Hamar Olympic Hall. 44 competitors from 17 nations participated in the competition. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing world and Olympic records were as follows: The following new world record was set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
